list.name: RESERVE-BUOY
list.description: Instantly fills the Super meter, but the next Torpedo Throw doesn't stun opponents.
list.descriptionHtml: Instantly fills the Super meter, but the next Torpedo Throw doesn't stun opponents.

list.name: X-RAY-SHADES
